attributes.action: Ask the F.S.A. to launch an Investigation into the conduct of Swiftcover.com
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like a full and thorough investigation of the way Swiftcover has treated their customers over the last 2 years, as they are clearly in flagrant breach of the F.S.A. regulations of Treating customers fairly.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
